snippet: Mary T. Barra of General Motors will testify next week along with the outsider who led the company’s inquiry into a fatal ignition-switch flaw.
abstract: Mary T Barra, chief executive of General Motors, and former United States Atty Anton R Valukas will testify before House Energy and Commerce Committee's subcomittee on oversight and investigations; hearing concerns why GM failed to recognize fatal defect in Chevrolet Cobalts and other small cars.
lead_paragraph: Mary T. Barra of General Motors will testify next week along with the outsider who led the company’s inquiry into a fatal ignition-switch flaw.

headline.main: G.M. Chief to Appear Before House Panel Once Again
headline.print_headline: G.M. Chief to Appear Before House Panel Once Again

keywords.value: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
keywords.name: organizations
